aiExperienceInfo.intro: Artemis gives you full control over how AI supports your learning. Choose the option that works best for you — you can change your mind at any time.
aiExperienceInfo.cloudWhatIsIt: Cloud AI connects you to powerful language models like GPT-4 and GPT-5 from OpenAI, running on Microsoft Azure servers located in the European Union.
aiExperienceInfo.cloudHowDoesItWork: When you chat with Iris or request AI feedback, your questions and relevant exercise content are sent to EU-based Azure servers for processing. The AI generates a response and sends it back to Artemis — no data is stored in the cloud.
aiExperienceInfo.cloudData3: Code you have written for programming exercises
aiExperienceInfo.cloudDataNot1: Your personal details (name, matriculation number, email)
aiExperienceInfo.cloudBenefit1: Access to the most capable AI models available today
aiExperienceInfo.cloudBenefit3: You automatically benefit from newer, better models as they become available
aiExperienceInfo.cloudBenefit4: All AI-powered features in Artemis work at their best
aiExperienceInfo.cloudSecurity1: All processing follows EU data protection regulations
aiExperienceInfo.cloudSecurity2: Your data never leaves the European Union
aiExperienceInfo.cloudSecurity3: Protected by Microsoft Azure's certified infrastructure
aiExperienceInfo.cloudSecurity4: Your data is never used to train or improve AI models
aiExperienceInfo.cloudSecurity5: All data is encrypted in transit
aiExperienceInfo.localWhatIsIt: Local AI uses open-source models such as Gemma and Llama, running entirely on the Technical University of Munich's own GPU servers. Your data never leaves the university network.
aiExperienceInfo.localHowDoesItWork: Everything happens on university-owned hardware in our data center. The same types of data are processed as with Cloud AI, but nothing is sent to external servers.
aiExperienceInfo.localDataProcessed: The same data as Cloud AI, but processed entirely within TUM infrastructure.
aiExperienceInfo.localBenefit1: Your data stays on university servers at all times
aiExperienceInfo.localBenefit2: TUM manages the entire infrastructure end-to-end
aiExperienceInfo.localBenefit4: Works without any connection to cloud providers
aiExperienceInfo.localLimit1: Typically 5–15 seconds depending on server load
aiExperienceInfo.localLimit2: Open-source models do not yet match the quality of commercial models
aiExperienceInfo.localLimit3: Features and quality are actively being improved
aiExperienceInfo.localLimit4: May be temporarily unavailable during maintenance or high demand
aiExperienceInfo.localWhyExperimental: We are continuously upgrading our local AI infrastructure. As we adopt better models and hardware, response quality and speed will improve over time.
aiExperienceInfo.noAiWhatIsIt: Prefer to work without AI? No problem. All core features of Artemis remain fully available — you just won't see AI-powered features like Iris or automated feedback.
aiExperienceInfo.noAiWorks4: Communicating with instructors and other students
aiExperienceInfo.noAiDoesnt1: The AI tutor will not be available to answer your questions
aiExperienceInfo.noAiDoesnt2: No automated feedback on text or modeling exercises
aiExperienceInfo.noAiDoesnt3: No AI-generated hints, explanations, or recommendations
aiExperienceInfo.whenToChoose: When is this the right choice?
aiExperienceInfo.noAiWhen1: You want to learn without any AI assistance
aiExperienceInfo.noAiWhen2: You prefer maximum privacy with zero AI data processing
aiExperienceInfo.noAiWhen3: You have concerns about AI-generated content
aiExperienceInfo.noAiWhen4: You want to rely entirely on human feedback and support
aiExperienceInfo.changingChoiceText: You can switch your AI preference at any time from your user settings under AI Experience. Changes take effect immediately across all courses.
aiExperienceInfo.dataStorageIntro: No matter which option you choose, your core data — grades, submissions, and personal information — is always stored on university servers and is never shared with external AI providers.
aiExperienceInfo.cloudAiStorage: Exercise content is sent to Azure servers for processing only and is not stored there
aiExperienceInfo.localAiStorage: All processing happens on university-owned infrastructure
aiExperienceInfo.noAiStorage: No AI processing takes place at all
